--- alter_search_index_drop_stored_column.sql
ALTER SEARCH INDEX AlbumsIndex DROP STORED COLUMN Genre
--- AST
&ast.AlterSearchIndex{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 19,
    NameEnd: 30,
    Name:    "AlbumsIndex",
  },
  IndexAlteration: &ast.DropStoredColumn{
    Drop: 31,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 50,
      NameEnd: 55,
      Name:    "Genre",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER SEARCH INDEX AlbumsIndex DROP STORED COLUMN Genre
